title: Channeling Cleopatra
description: One of the most beautiful and powerful women in history. Cleopatra had it all. And now anyone can, too. For a price. Her secrets...her wiles... her way with men-all transplanted from her DNA.  The only problem is no one has found it yet.  The chase is on-and forensic anthropologist Leda Hubbard is leading the pack.
author: Elizabeth Ann Scarborough
